name: CarePulse Healthcare App
desc: A scalable healthcare management platform using Next.js, Appwrite, and TypeScript, enabling secure patient registration, automated appointment scheduling, and an admin dashboard for managing 1,000+ patient records.

name: To Do App
desc: A dockerized full-stack ToDo application built using Node.js, PostgreSQL, and Prisma ORM with JWT authentication for secure user access and session management. Deployed using Heroku with Docker containers.

name: Brogram - Smart Workout Generator
desc: A smart workout generation web app built using React.js and Fanta.css. Implements a rule-based workout algorithm that dynamically adjusts exercises based on user experience, environment, and fitness goals.
